data.name: HERO'S PARTY R
data.detailed_description:
New Releases

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1731200
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1826160


About the Game

Hero's Party R is an SRPG developed by NAGINATA SOFT, and published by OTAKU Plan.

STORY

"Find 30 people to come to the Demon Castle party!"
One day, the king received a letter from the demon king, the old enemy of mankind.
Although it was obviously a trap, the king decided to take advantage of this opportunity to suppress the Demon Castle.
The chosen commander is the newcomer Rutherford.
Rutherford accepted the king's entrustment and embarked on the journey of looking for 30 companions with different personalities to attack the Demon Castle.

FEATURES

  • Classic Japanese SRPG
  • 60 characters to find
  • Rich story

data.short_description: "Find 30 people to come to the Demon Castle party!" One day, the king received a letter from the demon king, the old enemy of mankind. Although it was obviously a trap, the king decided to take advantage of this opportunity to suppress the Demon Castle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
